column4: ive had linux for just over a week and personally im very happy with the change, the only issues i hav ecome across are becuase of my human error
yeah..some people have no problems with the switch, some do...imo its just experience levels.
oh i have had problems, but the support here is just so active that they dont last long, the worst of which would probly be wireless because i installed ndiswrapper when i didnt need to :/
